item.title: Voters Support Removing Traffic Enforcement From Police Purview in New York
item.description: The largest predictor of police violence in America is not poor training, lack of discipline, or militarization. The largest predictor is simply contact with the police--and the most common contact Americans have with police is traffic stops.
item.author: (Billie Kanfer)

item.title: Why do ARM chips have an instruction with Javascript in the name (FJCVTZS)?
item.description: FJCVTZS is "Floating-point Javascript Convert to Signed fixed-point, rounding toward Zero". It is supported in Arm v8.3-A chips and later. Which is odd, because you don't expect to see JavaScript...
item.author: (Tim Smith)

item.title: Download the Atkinson Hyperlegible Font | Braille Institute
item.description:
A new typeface – greater legibility and readability for low vision readers
Atkinson Hyperlegible font is named after Braille Institute founder, J. Robert Atkinson.  What makes it different from traditional typography design is that it focuses on letterform distinction to increase character recognition, ultimately improving readability.  We are making it free for anyone to use,
item.author: (Braille Institute Staff)

item.title: How to waste your career, one comfortable year at a time
item.description: If you are an average 30 yr old engineer, let's say you want to retire reasonably by the time you are 60. A year wasted at a poor job or role is equivalent to you throwing away 3.3% of your career. The older you get, the steeper your loss is.
item.author: (Apoorva Govind)

item.title: Mr. Rogers was a friend to everyone. But to one sick little girl, he was a life saver
item.description: Beth's condition caused her to have 100 seizures a day. Miraculously, the only time she wouldn't seize was while watching Mr. Rogers' Neighborhood.
item.author: (Author: Andie Judson)
